name: Mikaela Mangert Sturk
description: Mikaela is a thoughtful and detail-oriented developer with a strong sense for structure, clarity, and user-focused design. With a background in music publishing and administration, she brings a rare combination of precision, creativity, and problem-solving into her code. She builds intuitive, accessible applications and approaches complex challenges with calm, analytical thinking. Her drive to learn and improve makes her a valuable addition to any team and a promising developer in the tech field.
techStack: HTML, CSS, Flexbox, JavaScript, ES6, JSX, React, React Hooks, Node.js, Mongo DB, Web Accessibility, API:s, mob-programming, pair-programming, Github.
